Edges-Blighted -- Female Human Seasoned Blighted
Attributes (7 Points):
Agility: d4 Smarts: d4 Spirit: d6 Strength: d8 Vigor: d12
Skills (14 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d4-1 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Athletics: (agi) d4 Occult: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4-1 Persuasion: (spi) d4 Thievery: (agi) d4
Faith: (spi) d4 Repair: (sma) d4
Focus: (spi) d8 Research: (sma) d4
Skill Notes: Clueless+: -1 Common Knowledge/-1 Notice
Size: 0
Advances: 4 Improvement Points: 12 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 4; Edge: 6; Skill: 2
Features
Edges (4 points): Arcane Background (Blighted); Hell's Wrath; Sixth Sense; Universal Ward Hindrances: Cautious; Clueless+; Doubting Thomas Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Background (Blighted): Has Favored Power and Corruption+ features
Arcane Background (Blighted)-1: May take edges particular to other arcane backgrounds
Cautious: Requires a detailed plan before acting
Doubting Thomas: Insists on rationalizing supernatural events
Combat
Parry: 5 (3) Cover: 4 Toughness: 10 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Flak Jacket Shield: Riot Shield Weapons: Smith & Wesson (2d6+1 R12" AP 1); Stake (d8+d4 R2"); Unarmed (d8+d0); Winchester '73 (2d8 R24" AP 2)
Combat Notes:
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Sixth Sense: May spend up to 4 Power Points to increase Evasion or reduce damage by an equal amount
Universal Ward: Supernatural creatures cannot attack self (Spirit-4 neg)
Arcana
Power Count: 2 Power Points: 15
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Blighted): 2 Powers/15 Power Points
Corruption+: Critical failure on arcane skill inflicts additional or increased hindrance until next advance
Favored Power: Ignores 2 points of penalties when casting chosen power
Hell's Wrath: Bolt, Blast, and Burst inflict +2 damage
Notes
Validation Errors:
Hell's Wrath Edge: Requires advances (currently 4) >= 4 and arcane background (demonologist) feature
Sixth Sense Edge: Requires advances (currently 4) >= 8 and arcane background (fortune teller) feature
Universal Ward Edge: Requires advances (currently 4) >= 4 and arcane background (occultist) feature
